description: As a consultant, I want to be able to use an invoice with PDF format
name: generate an invoice

elements.name: I can download my invoice as a PDF

steps.name: I have filled my timesheet
I have entered my billing details
I click the download as PDF link
a PDF invoice with the corresponding data downloads to my computer

elements.name: I had established an invoice without filled optionals fields

steps.name: I click the download as PDF link
all informations about optionals fields are hidden

elements.name: I can choose the RCS exemption for me and the client

steps.name: I have chosen RCS exemption for me and the client in my invoice form
I click the download as PDF link
RCS city names will not appear in my PDF invoice
will not appear in the remind of personal informations at the bottom of the invoice
messages about RCS exemption will appear on the top of the invoice

elements.name: I can choose the VAT exemption

steps.name: I have choosen the VAT exemption
I click the download as PDF link
my PDF invoice will not contain a total incl tax
only total excl tax

elements.name: What should includ the total excl tax of my invoice with the VAT exemption

steps.name: I have choosen the VAT exemption
my PDF invoice appears
the total excl tax of my invoice will contain the total excl tax of working days
the total excl tax of mileage allowance
the total excl tax of flat fees
the total incl tax of miscellaneous expenses

elements.name: I want to see a total incl tax

steps.name: I filled my timesheet
I didn't choose VAT exemption
I click the download as PDF link
my PDF invoice will contain a total excl tax
will contain a total incl tax

elements.name: I want to be paid by any paiement method

steps.name: I filled the billing form
When I click the download as PDF link
a PDF invoice containing the date of billing will appear

elements.name: I want to be paid by bank transfer

steps.name: I filled at least one information of my bank detail
I click the download as PDF link
a PDF invoice containing this bank details will appear

elements.name: I want to inform my client about late fee of paiement

steps.name: I have chosen to inform my client about late fee of paiement in the billing form
I click the download as PDF link
a detailed message about late fee of paiement will be present in the PDF invoice

elements.name: I can consult quickly the different costs of my invoice

steps.name: I filled my timesheet
other expenses
I click the download as PDF link
a summary table of costs will be present on the invoice
this table will contain a line for each deductible vat rate and non deductible vat rate by type of expense

elements.name: I want consult details of invoiced fees

steps.name: I filled expense form
I click the download as PDF link
a table specific to each type of expense will be present in appendix of the invoice

elements.name: I want consult the total amounts by vat rates

steps.name: I filled expenses form with different vat rates
I click the download as PDF link
a line will be present for each total amount of vat rate

elements.name: I want know details about service delivery

steps.name: I filled my timesheet
filled the invoice form
I click the download as PDF link
a line with the period of service delivery will be present
the name of the consultant will be present

elements.name: I want to see a reminder of my personal informations at the bottom of my invoice

steps.name: I filled my invoice form
I click the download as PDF
a line at the bottom of each page of my PDF invoice will remind my personal informations

description: As a consultant, I want to get a refund, then I declare them.
name: generate a flat fee expense

elements.name: I need to enter an expense of type flat fee

steps.name: I am editing a timesheet
I click on "Ajouter des frais" checkbox
the associated form appears

elements.name: I want close my expenses form

steps.name: I am editing a timesheet
my expenses form is open
I click on "Ajouter des frais" checkbox
the expenses form is hidden

elements.name: I Add a flat fee

steps.name: I am editing a timesheet
I have filled-out the "Date" and "Montant HT" inputs
I click the button "Ajouter"
a new line containing these informations appears in the chart below
the "Total HT" cell is ubdated

elements.name: I forgot to fill in a form field

steps.name: I am editing a timesheet
I forgot to fill in a form field
I click on "Ajouter" button
an error message appears near the associated input
I can't validate my form
no line is generated in the table

elements.name: I want to delete a line of table mileage allowance

steps.name: I am editing a timesheet
I click on the trash icon of a line in the table
the line of this table is deleted
the "Total HT" cell is ubdated

description: As a consultant, I want to get a refund, then I declare them.
name: generate an expense report of mileage allowance

elements.name: I need to enter an expense of type mileage

steps.name: I am editing a timesheet
I click on "Ajouter des frais" checkbox
the associated form appears

elements.name: I want close my expenses form

steps.name: I am editing a timesheet
my expenses form is open
I click on "Ajouter des frais" checkbox
it is hidden

elements.name: I want to select a vehicle in a dropdown

steps.name: I am editing a timesheet
I click on the vehicle selector
a list of each fiscal power appears
I can click on the wanted vehicle power

elements.name: I want customize my allowance rate

steps.name: I am editing a timesheet
I click on the vehicle selector
I can choice the customizable rate at the end of the list
a new field named "Taux personnalisé" appears
I can define my own rate

elements.name: I Add a mileage expense

steps.name: I am editing a timesheet
I have filled-out the "Date", "Trajet", "Distance parcourue" and "Véhicule" inputs
I click the button "Ajouter"
a new line containing these informations appears in the chart below
the "Total HT" cell is ubdated

elements.name: I forgot to fill in a form field

steps.name: I am editing a timesheet
I forgot to fill in a form field
I click on "Ajouter" button
an error message appears near the input associated with
I can't validate my form
no line is generated in the table

elements.name: I want to delete a line of table mileage allowance

steps.name: I am editing a timesheet
I click on the trash icon of a line in the table
the line of this table is deleted
the "Total HT" cell is ubdated

description: As a consultant, I want to get a refund, then I declare them.
name: generate an expense report of mileage allowance

elements.name: I need to generate an expense of type miscellaneous

steps.name: I am on timesheet edit page
I click on "Ajouter des frais" checkbox
a form appears

elements.name: I want close my expenses generator

steps.name: I am on timesheet edit page
my expenses generator is open
I click on "Ajouter des frais" checkbox
the associated form is hidden

elements.name: I want choose my type of expense

steps.name: I am on timesheet edit page
I click on the type of expense selector
a list of the different types of expense appears
I can click on the wanted type of expense

elements.name: I Add a miscellaneous expense

steps.name: I am on timesheet edit page
I have filled-out the "Date", "Trajet", "Distance parcourue" and "Véhicule" inputs
I click the button "Ajouter"
a new line containing these informations appears in the chart below
the "Total" cell is ubdated

elements.name: I forgot to fill in a form field

steps.name: I am on timesheet edit page
I forgot to fill in a form field (except "label")
I click on "Ajouter" button
an error message appears near the input associated with
I can't validate my form
no line is generated in the table

elements.name: I don't fill the "libellé" input

steps.name: I am on timesheet edit page
I click on "Ajouter" button
"libellé" input is empty
others inputs are filled
I click on "Ajouter" button
A line a table appears with all informations that I filled

elements.name: I want to delete a line of table miscellaneous expenses

steps.name: I am on timesheet edit page
I click on the trash icon of a line in the table
the line of this table is deleted
the "Total" cell is ubdated

description: As a consultant I want easily generate an invoice
name: generate invoice

elements.name: I need to generate an invoice

steps.name: I am on timesheet edit page
I click on "Generer une facture" checkbox
the associated form appears

elements.name: I want close my invoice form

steps.name: I am on timesheet edit page
my invoice form is open
I click on "Generer une facture" checkbox
this form is hidden

elements.name: The invoice's form should be pre-filled with the date of the day

steps.name: I am on timesheet edit page
my invoice form is open
I can see the invoice's date pre-filled with today's date

elements.name: I fill the invoice form

steps.name: I am on timesheet edit page
I fill all inputs in the form
I click on "Valider mon CRA" button
a success notification appears
a link to an invoice PDF appears

elements.name: I forgot to fill a required input in the form

steps.name: I am on timesheet edit page
I click on "Valider mon CRA" button
I forget to fill an input
a fail notification appears
an error message appears near the input
I can't validate my form

elements.name: I fill all required input in the form

steps.name: I am on timesheet edit page
All required fields are completed but not the optional ones
I click on "Valider mon CRA" button
The form is validated with not any problem

elements.name: I modify an input after a form validation

steps.name: I am on timesheet edit page
I validated the form
I modify an input
the links and success notification are hidden
I need to validate again the form

elements.name: I want to download my invoice

steps.name: I am on timesheet edit page
I validated my form
I click on "Télécharger la facture" button
my invoice is downloaded as a PDF file

elements.name: Exempt provider or customer of RCS/RM

steps.name: I am on timesheet edit page
I click on checkbox "Dispensé d'immatriculation au RCS et au RM" in form
the related City immatriculation input become disabled

elements.name: I want apply vta exemption

steps.name: I am on timesheet edit page
I click on checkbox "Franchise TVA" in form
the related vta number input become disabled
if the exeption concerns the provider vta will not be applied on total of the performance

elements.name: Late fee apply on customer invoice

steps.name: I am on timesheet edit page
I click on checkbox "Pénalités de retard légales"
a late fee will be applied on total of the performance

description:
In order to be paid
  As a consultant
  I want to enter my activity report
name: Enter my activity report

elements.name: I can validate my inputs

steps.name: I have navigated to the create page
I have filled-out the "Consultant", "Mission" and "Journées d'intervention" forms
I click on "Valider mon CRA" button
a success message appears
the links appears except the invoice one

elements.name: I made a mistake filling the form and I try to validate it

steps.name: I have navigated to the create page
I click on "Valider mon CRA" button
I have not filled-out the form correctly
a fail notification appears
an error message appears near the input
my inputs aren't validated

elements.name: I change the value of an input after a form validation

steps.name: I have navigated to the create page
I validated the form
I change the value of an input
the Links and success notification are hidden
I have to validate the form

elements.name: I can select the month I worked

steps.name: I have navigated to the create page
the selected month is January 2019
I have selected the first day
I click the next button
the selected month should be Feburay 2019
the days selection should have been emptied

elements.name: I can select the month I worked

steps.name: I have navigated to the create page
the selected month is January 2019
I have selected the first day
I click the previous button
the selected month should be December 2018
the days selection should have been emptied

elements.name: I can indicate how many days I worked in the month

steps.name: I have navigated to the create page
I select the days I worked
the "Nombre total de journées :" should be updated as well

elements.name: I want delete a worked day on the calendar

steps.name: I have navigated to the create page
I selected one day
I click on this day box
this day is reset
the days selection should have been updated

elements.name: I want to display working time options for a day

steps.name: I have navigated to the create page
I have selected a day
I hover on the blue pastille
new choice appears

elements.name: I select half a day as the working time for a day

steps.name: I have navigated to the create page
I have displayed time options for a day
I click on half a day
The blue pastille show "0,5 jour"
the days selection should have been updated

elements.name: I select zero as the working time for a day

steps.name: I have navigated to the create page
I have displayed time options for a day
I click on zero
this day is reset
the days selection should have been updated

elements.name: I can go back to the homepage

steps.name: I have navigated to the create page
I click the Logo
I should go to the "homepage"

description: As a service company, I want to get authenticated
name: load a timesheet from local storage

elements.name: I can open the login form

steps.name: I have navigated to the homepage
I click on the button "Je suis une société de services"
The login form pop-in shows

elements.name: I can open the login form when reviewing a timesheet

steps.name: I have navigated to the homepage
I click on the button "Accèder à mon compte prestataire"
The login form pop-in shows

elements.name: I can register

steps.name: I have opened the login form
clicked the button "S'inscrire"
I have filled my user ID
I click the button "S'inscrire"
I'm registered

elements.name: I can login

steps.name: I have opened the login form
I have filled my user ID
I click the button "Se connecter"
I'm logged in

elements.name: I can logout

steps.name: I am logged in
I have open the connection windows
I click the button "Se déconnecter"
I'm logged out

elements.name: I fail to login

steps.name: I have opened the login form
I have filled my 	user ID
I click the button "Se connecter"
I see a message telling me that my credentials are incorrect

description: As a user, I want to get notified
name: I receive a notification

elements.name: The notification is getting out of time

steps.name: A notification just appears
the notification has a duration
It time's up
the notification should disappears

elements.name: I want to dismiss this notification

steps.name: A notification just appears
the notification is dismissable
I click on "close" button
the notification should disappears

description: As a provider I want transfer the present invoice for re-invoicing
name: transfer my invoice

elements.name: I need to re-invoice my consultant invoice to my client

steps.name: I am on timesheet review page
I click on "Facturer ce CRA" button
a new timesheet edit page appears with pre-filled informations about consultant
a new timesheet edit page appears with pre-filled informations about mission
a new timesheet edit page appears with pre-filled working days
a new timesheet edit page appears with pre-filled expenses
a new timesheet edit page appears with pre-filled informations of my company in provider side form

elements.name: I transfer a timesheet with no invoice

steps.name: I am on timesheet review page
I have no invoice in my timesheet
I transfer a timesheet
a new timesheet edit page appears with pre-filled informations about consultant
a new timesheet edit page appears with pre-filled informations about mission
a new timesheet edit page appears with pre-filled working days
a new timesheet edit page appears with pre-filled expenses

elements.name: I want have client informations pre-filled if I have already saved a timesheet with a consultant and this client in my database when I re-invoice

steps.name: I am on timesheet review page
I already have a timesheet in my local storage with a consultant associated to a provider and a client
I click on "Facturer ce CRA" button with a timesheet with this provider as a client and this consultant as a provider
a new timesheet edit page appears with pre-filled informations about consultant
a new timesheet edit page appears with pre-filled informations about mission
a new timesheet edit page appears with pre-filled working days
a new timesheet edit page appears with pre-filled informations about this client
a new timesheet edit page appears with pre-filled informations about this provider
a new timesheet edit page appears with pre-filled informations about banking informations
none informations about dates
none information about invoice number

description: As a use, i want load a previous timesheet using local storage
name: load a timesheet from local storage

elements.name: I can save a timesheet

steps.name: I have filled my timesheet
I click "Valider mon CRA" button
this timesheet will be save in local storage

elements.name: I want have pre-filled fields with my last timesheet informations validated

steps.name: I have a saved timesheet in local storage
I arrive on the create timesheet page
the last informations I saved in local storage are pre-filled
expenses are reset
workings day are reset
invoice date and number are reset
billing date is reset

I click on "Valider mon CRA" button
